evidence.claim: Direct Search Systems utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure services.
The company implements FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Direct Search Systems has documented their use of HIPAA compliance in their data handling practices.
The integration patterns used by Direct Search Systems are detailed in their development documentation.
Direct Search Systems supports X12 transactions as part of their healthcare solutions.

icp.icp_reason: Company uses HIPAA X12 and focuses on healthcare data exchange, aligning with API needs.
